articles.author: Furqan Shahid
articles.title: Microsoft’s Copilot App Is Finally Available For iPhone And iPad Users - Wccftech
articles.description: Microsoft has finally launched Copilot app on both iPhones and iPads, allowing you to experience company's generative AI for free.
articles.content: Earlier this month, Microsoft finally launched its AI companion Copilot on Android, and at that time, the app was not available for Apple users. That changes today as the company has now launched the… [+1634 chars]
